description: Mass Accept- Allows users to select a group of serial numbers that require inspection and perform a mass approval

Mass Reject/Scrap- For Rejects: program process updates thru Quality interface and no move transaction occurs. For Scrap: program does four things 1. Updates Job/Op/Serial Number with Scrap 2. Updates subsequent operations/serial number with inspection result NA_SM 3. Inserts records into WIP_MOVE_TXN_INTERFACE for each job/opstep/sn to move from current operation to the last operation's Scrap intraoperation step 4. Launch WIP Move Trxns Manager to process the records in the interface.
Aegis FactoryLogix WIP Integration (for sites Endicott and Fort Wayne)
